***REMOVED***% for name, value in widget.attrs.items() %***REMOVED******REMOVED***% if value is not sameas False %***REMOVED*** ***REMOVED******REMOVED*** name ***REMOVED******REMOVED******REMOVED***% if value is not sameas True %***REMOVED***="***REMOVED******REMOVED*** value ***REMOVED******REMOVED***"***REMOVED***% endif %***REMOVED******REMOVED***% endif %***REMOVED******REMOVED***% endfor %***REMOVED***
